title: Trump shills are just the worst kind of people.
body:
I might be biased cause I voted for Trump and these people make me feel bad by association, but holy god these Trump shills I keep seeing really rip at my nerves.

I'm talking about the people who are physically incapable of understanding that Trump is in fact capable of doing wrong, and that any criticism against him means you are automatically a liberal cucktard sjw pineapple whatever.
